short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to make navigation to certain places in GitHub easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension aims to improve a user's experience on github.com by saving them time and providing them with various shortcuts, buttons and information visible on the sidebar of the GitHub dashboard.
